codeSystems.name: AllergenWithExceptions
codeSystems.title: eHDSI Agent or Allergen With Exceptions
codeSystems.description:
The Value Set is used for coding s specific allergen or other agent/substance (drug, food, chemical agent, etc.) to which the patient has an adverse reaction propensity.
It is defined as the union of:
(a) eHDSIAllergenNoDrug
(b) DLP_lecivePripravky
(c) DLP_ATC
(d) eHDSIAbsentOrUnknownAllergy
(e) eHDSIExceptionalValue

codeSystems.name: MedicalDeviceWithExceptionsVS
codeSystems.title: Medical Device with exceptions
codeSystems.description:
The Value Set is used for coding implanted and external medical devices and equipment.
It also includes exceptional values.
